text: Hotel Dusk: Room 215 (ウィッシュルーム 天使の記憶, Wisshu Rūmu Tenshi no Kioku, lit. "Wish Room: Memories of the Angel") is a graphic adventure game for portatil console, Nintendo DS. It was first announced on October 5, 2005, under the name Wish Room. The game was shown to the public for the first time on May 9, 2006, at the E3 video game convention that year. It was released in the United States on January 22, 2007, followed by Japan three days later, and then in Europe on April 13, 2007. The game is part of the Touch! Generations series of DS games and supports the Nintendo DS Rumble Pak accessory. It was developed by Cing, a company that is no longer in business. A sequel, Last Window: The Secret of Cape West, was released in 2010 for the DS. Hotel Dusk: Room 215 is often considered one of the best games in the history of the Nintendo DS by those who have played it. It has received very positive reviews, especially for its story and soundtrack. title: Hotel Dusk
